title: Print house identity
content:
A business card proposed for one of the largest printing houses in Romania. The symbol is the best I could come up with, the logotype is a "black" version of Rotis SemiSerif.   
   
Your comments have always been a great help. Thank you.   
   
george // cellsius design   
   
 ![img.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052435im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1761.gif)
author: george
